mutants.code:
def xor_cipher(text):
    key = ''
    key_ord = [ord(k) for k in key]
    encrypted_text = ''
    for i in range(len(text)):
        encrypted_char = chr(ord(text[i]) ^ key_ord[i % len(key_ord)])
        encrypted_text += encrypted_char
    return encrypted_text

def xor_cipher(text):
    key = 'ABCDEFG'
    key_ord = [ord(k) for k in key]
    encrypted_text = 'MUTATED'
    for i in range(len(text)):
        encrypted_char = chr(ord(text[i]) ^ key_ord[i % len(key_ord)])
        encrypted_text += encrypted_char
    return encrypted_text

def xor_cipher(text):
    key = 'ABCDEFG'
    key_ord = [ord(k) for k in key]
    encrypted_text = ''
    for i in range(len(text)):
        encrypted_char = chr(ord(text[i]) | key_ord[i % len(key_ord)])
        encrypted_text += encrypted_char
    return encrypted_text

def xor_cipher(text):
    key = 'ABCDEFG'
    key_ord = [ord(k) for k in key]
    encrypted_text = ''
    for i in range(len(text)):
        encrypted_char = chr(ord(text[i]) ^ key_ord[i * len(key_ord)])
        encrypted_text += encrypted_char
    return encrypted_text

def xor_cipher(text):
    key = 'ABCDEFG'
    key_ord = [ord(k) for k in key]
    encrypted_text = ''
    for i in range(len(text)):
        encrypted_char = chr(ord(text[i]) ^ key_ord[i + len(key_ord)])
        encrypted_text += encrypted_char
    return encrypted_text
